Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Deep goblet with a rounded conical base, slightly restricted mouth and thickened lip. The inside is pink-beige with black patches, whereas the outside is of a black colour with pink-beige patches. Both surfaces were polished horizontally and diagonally. The craftsmanship is rather crude and the shape is asymmetrical.
